授業目的: このコースはオーラルイングリッシュ IA に基づいて、グループワークを通じた英語コミュニケーションに重点を置いています。学生は、タスク中およびタスク外での英語でのコミュニケーションや、自己学習/振り返りを行うことで、オーラルイングリッシュの能力を継続的に伸ばしていきます。
到達目標:
学生は、問題解決、推論、意思決定、予測などのコミュニケーションの方法を広げるだけでなく、観光、文化、テクノロジー、社会問題など、コミュニケーションができるトピックを広げていきます。
また、英語を使用してグループタスクを成功させるために必要な対人スキルも引き続き伸ばしていきます。
授業の概要・背景: This is a communication focused course, classes will be based on interactive communication using a combination of pair and group work, to help boost students English communication abilities and confidence.
授業方法:
Students will develop their English communication skills by performing learning activities and holding
discussions in pairs, groups of four and whole class groups.
Sessions will be conducted 'face to face.'

第1回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 1 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第2回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 2 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第3回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 3 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第4回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 4 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第5回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 5 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第6回: Prepare for the mid-term speaking test (about 2 hours).
第7回: Review & mid-term speaking test. Students will talk about the topics covered so far using the English they have learned. Tests will be done in pairs.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 7 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第8回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 8 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第9回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 9 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第10回: Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 10 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第11回: Prepare for the final speaking test (about 2 hours).
第12回: Review & final speaking test. Students will talk about the topics covered this semester using the English they have learned. Tests will be done in pairs.
Complete self-study task assigned at the end of Session 12 and prepare for the next session (about 2 hours).
第13回: Presentation Project (Part 1). Students will form groups and create ideas to present to the class. This is a chance to be creative and is not limited to an academic style presentation using PowerPoint.
第14回:
Presentation Project (Part 2). Students will practice and then show their project to the class.
Reflection: time will be given for students to reflect on the course and their progress this year.
Students will discuss final assessment and grading throughout the course
